snippet.title: Tails From Alteria - Mother Direct 2022 Trailer
snippet.description:
Back again! Tails From Alteria returns to the Mother Direct with a vengeance! Tails From Alteria is an adventure RPG about two twin foxes' journey across the world as it ends!

You'll take control of Jeeve and Jayla as they race to stop an extra-dimensional evil from pouring into their world. Work as a team to solve problems and utilize the unique abilities of the twins and their friends. No problem is too great that it can't be overcome by top-tier teamwork! Help back it on Kickstarter! 

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/...
Demo on Itch: https://jeevejayla.itch.io/tails-from...
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/18...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/JeeveNJayla
